DOC.brief_title: Nitric Oxide ( NO ) Donors Inhibitors Study : Study Evaluate L-Arginine Aminoguanidine Asthmatic Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy nonsmoker ( n=10 ) : Nonatopic subject ( exhale NO great equal 10 ppb ; flow 50 ml/s ) Normal spirometry Able comprehend grant write informed consent Asthmatic subject ( n=15 ) : Forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) less 70 % predict ( exhaled NO great equal 15 ppb ; flow 50 ml/s ) Clinically stable ( steroidna√Øve take > 600 mcg/day inhale steroid ) Able comprehend grant write informed consent Currently smoke Any lung disease asthma may interfere study Treatment within last 4 week oral steroid Respiratory infection within 4 week prior entry trial Females pregnant lactate History current past drug alcohol abuse
